title: The Lost Ode
description: Literary scholar and amateur sleuth Julia has stumbled on a family secret . . . a secret steeped in the history of Kentucky’s thoroughbred country and linked to the descendants of poet John Keats and his brother George. When the owner of Brookfield Stud Farm, Gray Burke, is arrested for homicide Julia is left to solve the murder and prove his innocence while following the trail to the Keats’ lost fortune. Solving the murder may lead to love and treasure, but has Julia backed the wrong horse in believing in Gray’s innocence?
author: Virginia Slachman
